Uses of Class
peregrine.controller.BaseJob

Packages that use BaseJob
peregrine Main peregrine package including core interfaces for writing jobs. 
peregrine.app.benchmark Benchmark framework which writes keys using an ExtractWriter and then runs a map and reduce job across them. 
peregrine.app.flow A graph 'flow' algorithm which checks for root node graph connectivity. 
peregrine.app.pagerank Pagerank implementation which uses advanced features like merge, broadcast variables, to speed up computation. 
peregrine.app.pagerank.compact Take a minor graph compaction, and a major graph compaction, and merge them. 
peregrine.app.pagerank.extract   
 

Uses of BaseJob in peregrine
 

Subclasses of BaseJob in peregrine
 class Batch
          A 'batch' of jobs sent to the controller at once.
 class Job
          Represents a job (map, merge, or, reduce) which much be run by Peregrine.

Subclasses of BaseJob in peregrine.app.flow
 class Flow
           A 'flow' algorithm which starts off at a set of course nodes and finds connectivity between them.
 

Uses of BaseJob in peregrine.app.pagerank
 

Subclasses of BaseJob in peregrine.app.pagerank
 class Pagerank
           Pagerank implementation which uses Peregrine as a backend for fast computation.
 

Uses of BaseJob in peregrine.app.pagerank.compact
 

Subclasses of BaseJob in peregrine.app.pagerank.compact
 class Compact
          Build a 'compaction' of two graphs by merging the data from both imput files and merging the records together.
